text: Jiaru ni [dui bai ouxiang zhe she an la er chongbai ouxiang he fouren ni] gandao jingya, name, tamen de zhexie hua cai shi ke jingya [zhu 1] de:“Dang women bian cheng chentu shi, nandao women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo cheng yige xin de shengming ma?” Zhexie ren jiushi bu xinyang tamen de zhu de ren; zhexie ren de bozi shang daizhe jiasuo; zhexie ren shi huo yu de fanren, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong [zhu 2].
